task_summary: Detect the pot lid, align over its handle, grasp it, and lift it up from the pot.

task_long_description.overview: A mobile manipulator (Stretch) is positioned at a workbench with a metal pot placed on a small box. The goal is to lift the pot’s lid by targeting the lid handle. The robot first perceives the lid, moves to a safe height above the pot, computes a top grasp on the handle, aligns and lowers until contact, then closes the gripper and lifts the lid upward to clear the pot. Constraints include tight alignment and low-force contact during approach to avoid sliding the lid.
preconditions: Robot is in reach of the pot
Workspace is free of obstructions around the lid
Gripper is functional and can open to 0.09 m
stepwise_plan: Compute top grasp on lid handle
Align to handle and descend until contact
success_criteria: Lid is grasped by the handle
Lid is lifted clear of the pot rim
No collision with pot or environment
failure_and_recovery: Perception miss → retry detection up to 3 times
Weak grasp → reopen, recompute grasp, and retry
Unexpected contact force → stop descent and retreat slightly
task_long_description.termination: End when the lid is detected in the gripper and the arm has retreated to a clear height.

frame_3.now_evidence: Manipulator aligned above lid; approach vector is established.
frame_3.predicts_next: Descent/contact and grasp closure expected next.

task_instruction: lift up a lid from the pot

node_specs.description: Perceive the lid using onboard camera; retry guarded by decorator.
Verify the lid remains visible before motion.
Move to a pregrasp height above the pot.
Plan a top grasp on the lid handle; store in blackboard.
Ensure a planned grasp pose exists.
Align the end effector to the handle within tight tolerance.
Descend gently until contact with the handle is detected.
Check grasp stability prior to lifting.
Lift the lid upward to clear the pot.
Confirm the lid is held after retreat.

recovery_strategy: Abort descent on force threshold and re-approach
Reopen and increase force within allowed bins
assumptions: The lid has a protruding handle suitable for a top grasp
Workspace matches frames; no external disturbances
Instruction aligns with frames showing approach and lift of a pot lid

expected_success_criteria: Lid lifted clear and visible in gripper
No significant lateral slip during lift
